properties.label: VersaPay Customer Identifier
properties.name: versapay_customer_identifier
properties.hint: Contains the ID of the VersaPay Customer that was upserted ('0' if no upsert was completed)

properties.label: Insert Only

toggle_field.label: Insert Only
toggle_field.name: insert_only
toggle_field.hint: If set to 'True', only do an insert (do not update the VersaPay Customer if it already exists).  This is for performance to prevent unnecessary updates.

properties.name: insert_only
properties.hint: If set to 'True', only do an insert (do not update the VersaPay Customer if it already exists).  This is for performance to prevent unnecessary updates.

properties.label: Upsert Only When Present

toggle_field.label: Upsert Only When Present
toggle_field.name: upsert_only_when_present
toggle_field.hint: Only perform the upsert if the VersaPay Customer already exists in VersaPay.

properties.name: upsert_only_when_present
properties.hint: Only perform the upsert if the VersaPay Customer already exists in VersaPay.

properties.label: Is Autorenewal Child?

toggle_field.label: Is Autorenewal Child?
toggle_field.name: is_autorenewal_child
toggle_field.hint: Determines whether to create a child customer for auto-renewals

properties.name: is_autorenewal_child
properties.hint: Determines whether to create a child customer for auto-renewals
